TextStrings: WelcomingLowSkillName Basic Speaking Skills WelcomingLowSkillDescription Waiters need some practice in speaking with stranger if they want to properly handle all customers coming in. {MODIFIERS} WelcomingHighSkillName Oratory Art WelcomingHighSkillDescription Only the best waiters in the world can use only 20 words to deliver all relevant info to a customer. {MODIFIERS} SeatingLowSkillName Restaurant Mapping SeatingLowSkillDescription By creating accurate maps of the restaurant, it's easier for the Waiter to know where to place new, hungry customers. {MODIFIERS} SeatingHighSkillName Dog Trainer SeatingHighSkillDescription When hungry, customers are not unlike dogs: they lose reason and regress to a more primal state of being. Knowing how to train dogs to seat can be extremely useful in those cases. {MODIFIERS} DeliverOrdersLowSkillName Fast Delivery DeliverOrdersLowSkillDescription By learning the secrets of gravity, Waiters can use the forces of nature for a faster delivery. {MODIFIERS} DeliverOrdersHighSkillName Plates Throwing DeliverOrdersHighSkillDescription It doesn't take long to serve people if you throw them plates... {MODIFIERS} TakingOrdersLowSkillName Fast Writing TakingOrdersLowSkillDescription A good waiter needs to write down a dozen things at once, and then change everything WHEN THE COOKING CUSTOMERS CAN'T DECIDE WHAT TO EAT! {MODIFIERS} TakingOrdersHighSkillName Human Printer TakingOrdersHighSkillDescription The hand moves the pen with godlike precision, patterns of ink records an insane amount of orders in a small space: this waiter could now do a career change and work as a printer. {MODIFIERS} CleaningLowSkillName Geometrical Cleaning CleaningLowSkillDescription Cleaning neophytes randomly scrub the table for a few minutes, but once the art of geometrical cleaning is learned a waiter can save a lot of time. {MODIFIERS} CleaningHighSkillName The Shining CleaningHighSkillDescription Some people are not like the others: born with the incredible power of the Shining, everything they touches turn into a holy temple of cleaniness. {MODIFIERS} CheckOutLowSkillName The Bill CheckOutLowSkillDescription When it comes to paying the bill, it's always a delicate moment. Good Waiters know how to handle it. {MODIFIERS} CheckOutHighSkillName Costs Foreshadowing CheckOutHighSkillDescription The legend says that a good Waiter can suggest with subtle hints the cost of a dinner to the customers. And when it comes to the bill delivery, they already know what to do. {MODIFIERS} EnergyLowSkillName Fitness EnergyLowSkillDescription Working in a restaurant is not easy nor relaxing, a proper training is needed to endure a full service without fainting. {MODIFIERS} EnergyHighSkillName Crossfit Training Course EnergyHighSkillDescription The good thing about Crossfit is that it turns everyone into a fitness god capable of doing anything. The bad thing is that they will only talk about Crossfit. {MODIFIERS} SpeedSkillName Faster Than Light SpeedSkillDescription Just like in the savannah, you need to move fast in a restaurant if you want to survive. {MODIFIERS} AppetizerQualitySkillName Appetizers: Quality AppetizerQualitySkillDescription This Chef is experienced with Appetizers. The bonuses of this skill only apply to Appetizers {MODIFIERS} AppetizerPreparationSkillName Appetizers: Preparation AppetizerPreparationSkillDescription This Chef is experienced with Appetizers. The bonuses of this skill only apply to Appetizers {MODIFIERS} MainCourseQualitySkillName Main Courses: Quality MainCourseQualitySkillDescription This Chef is experienced with Main Courses.
